text: Rune Rebellion (born 21 August 1965) is the stage name of Rune Grønn, a guitarist from Verdal, Norway. He is most famous of being the rhythm guitarist of the Norwegian band Turbonegro, which he quit on 26 October 2007, and played his last show in Folken in Stavanger the day after. However, he returned in 2011. He, Pål Bøttger Kjærnes and Thomas Seltzer formed Turbonegro late in 1988. He currently works for Universal Music in Norway and runs Turbonegro's own label, Scandinavian Leather Recordings. == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian rock guitarists Category:Turbonegro members Category:Musicians from Verdal
title: Rune Rebellion
